segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, her hand outstretched toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her anticipation is almost palpable; it reminds me of my own childhood excitement for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that boy on the stool is a sight for sore eyes; he looks ready to tumble any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it amusing that they think they can get away with this without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I glance at the woman, her concentration so tight on that plate, she seems like she could be in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s sad that she’s missing out on this little adventure happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In a different way, the chaos in the kitchen feels completely alive, like a scene from a sitcom.
segments.speaker: PAR
